title: PBE Help
body: I just login to the PBE to check if my store was working but I see that I have  3000rp instead of 990000rp and instead of 999K BE i have 5 BE..... please fix this rito and the store I can't even open it so fix this please

replies.body: Nothing's broken! We altered how the PBE stipends work a bit. [**Be sure to read up on it over here**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-within-1-hour-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence)!
Yeah im having the same issue, i thought it will be 3k rp but inf but no. i have 4 BE now and 1305 RP.. hope they fix it asap..
